name: Resurrection (LaerteJunior)
description:
Game developed for Game Jam Ludum Dare 47,

Theme: Stuck in a loop

Life is an eternal cycle, and we will never know if we are at the end or the beginning!

Control: Arrows Keys = Move 

Game By Laerte Junior.

Musics Free Royalites : Ketsa_-_21_-_Snow_Top, Ketsa_-_Helping_Hands, Ketsa_-_Vibrancy, Ketsa_-_05_-_Nature_Shuffle
